name: [Algorithmia] Excessive Algorithm Runtime
message:
Some algorithms queries are running for more than 10 seconds.

This can result in delays in real-time API responses from your algorithms and a backlogged queue.

Review the documentation at https://algorithmia.com/developers/algorithm-development/advanced-algorithm-development/dealing-with-bottlenecks for more guidance on optimizing your algorithm's runtime.

recommended_monitor_metadata.description: Get notified when algorithms are taking more that 10 seconds to execute in Algorithmia.
